title: Metadata of the demo NFT token for the game Starlit Horizon.
description: Metadata of the demo NFT token for the game Starlit Horizon.

tech.trait.wallet.nft_token_description.nft_token_description: This game item is a striking, thorned crown that exudes an aura of darkness and power. Composed of sharp, metallic spikes, it glimmers with a menacing silver hue, accented by vibrant purple energy that radiates from its core. The item symbolizes both strength and sacrifice, embodying a duality of beauty and danger. Wearing this crown bestows significant enhancements to its wearer, amplifying their abilities and influence within the game world. Its formidable design not only makes a bold statement visually but also serves as a testament to the challenges faced and conquered by those who wield its power.
